changes.rscadd: Added a new triumph buy - Psydon's Favourite.
Added a new triumph buy - Psydon's Retirement Fund.
Storyteller bonus influence triumph buys are now limited to 2 per round and their price has decreased from 5 to 3.
All personal god objectives now award 1 extra triumph upon completion.

changes.qol: Improved Triumph Shop menu formatting, layout, pagination and texts.
